root.name: Discipline
root.description: Not much is known about this game other than the information released during the TGS08 press conference.In Discipline, the player takes part in a secret test and has to endure several trials. However the player soon discovers the dangerous truth behind these and will attempt to escape the facility.Discipline is directed by Kazutoshi Iida from Tail of the Sun fame and has been coined as a "real-life" simulation, the game could be using motion controls.
